Function Documentation

void bdbTriggerTouchlink ( bool  resetTargetToFN,
BDB_InitiatorReq_t *  initiatorReq,
void(*)(BDB_CommissioningStatus_t)  callback 
)

bdb internal API to Trigger Touchlink

Parameters:
[in]resetTargetToFN- if false- touchlink will be initiated, else resets the target
[in]initiatorReq- initiator parameters used for binding
[in]callback- callback function to be called once the operation is finished
bool bdbTouchlink_EventHandler ( N_Task_Event_t  evt)

The event handler for the component's task.

Parameters:
[in]evt- event to process
Returns:
true if event is handled, false - otherwise
